thing-type.label: OpenAI Account
thing-type.description: Account at OpenAI that is used for accessing the ChatGPT API.

parameter.name: apiKey
parameter.label: API Key
parameter.description: API key to access the account

parameter.name: apiUrl
parameter.label: API URL
parameter.description: The server API where to reach the AI service.

parameter.name: modelUrl
parameter.label: Model URL
parameter.description: The model url where to retrieve the available models from.

parameter.name: model
parameter.label: Model
parameter.description: The model to be used for the responses

parameter.name: temperature
parameter.label: Temperature
parameter.description: Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

parameter.name: systemMessage
parameter.label: System Message
parameter.description: The system message helps set the behavior of the assistant.

parameter.name: maxTokens
parameter.label: Maximum Number of Tokens
parameter.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion.
